[Home](./index.md) &gt; [@boba-cli/dsl](./dsl.md) &gt; [ListBuilderOptions](./dsl.listbuilderoptions.md)

## ListBuilderOptions interface

Options for the list component builder.

**Signature:**

```typescript
interface ListBuilderOptions<T extends Item> 
```

## Remarks

Configure the list component with items, styling, and behavior when creating a list component.
